conversion_verification.notes: The model is a faithful isometric-style cutaway rendering.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clean geometry and clear wall thickness.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the floor plan; all rooms and wall partitions are correctly placed. Slight simplification in door swing representation.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D layout perfectly, including bathroom and kitchen fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; minor deduction for slightly repetitive texture/colors on some furniture blocks.

detected_errors.description: Door swings are represented as openings/blocks rather than swinging leaves, which is standard for this 3D style.

summary: An exceptionally accurate and clean 3D conversion that maintains strict geometric fidelity to the original architectural floor plan.
